project-items.project-desc: This UI Framework was built on the ideas that there was not any UI component with same function built yet. This project was created by students of Bov Academy collaborating via GitHub. Bov Academy encouraged every student should build at least 3 innovative components to explore there creativity.

project-items.project-tech: React,Babel, Webpack, Html5, Css3 & vanilla Javacript
project-items.project-desc: This project was built on the event learning React. It was inspired website 500px.com. Currently, only galleries worked. I'm working on other functions & try to get it done.
This is assigned project that I collaborated with another student. Good practice on how to collaborate on GitHub and teamwork
A customized of Css3 Accordion without using Javascript
The e-commerce website built only with vanilla Javascript
This fun project I built when I just started learning HTML5, CSS3 at Bov Academy.
